keyword_strategy.competitor_analysis: Limited direct competition in professional paranormal investigation app space. Most existing apps focus on entertainment rather than professional analysis. Opportunity to establish premium professional category with authentic tools.
keyword_strategy.ranking_difficulty: Medium - paranormal investigation keywords have moderate competition but lack professional-focused apps. Professional audio analysis keywords are competitive but niche application provides differentiation opportunity.

pre_launch_activities.community_engagement: Engage with paranormal investigation forums, professional groups, and ghost hunting communities. Share educational content about proper EVP analysis techniques.
pre_launch_activities.influencer_outreach: Partner with respected paranormal investigators and YouTube channels focused on serious investigation rather than entertainment.
pre_launch_activities.content_creation: Develop educational materials about EVP analysis, comparison with hardware alternatives, and professional investigation techniques.

launch_week_activities.press_outreach: Reach out to paranormal investigation publications and podcasts for app coverage and professional endorsement.
launch_week_activities.community_announcement: Official launch announcement in paranormal investigation forums and professional groups.
launch_week_activities.demonstration_content: Release comparison videos showing app capabilities versus traditional hardware equipment.

post_launch_marketing.user_generated_content: Encourage professional users to share case studies and investigation results using the app.
post_launch_marketing.educational_series: Regular content series on proper EVP investigation techniques and evidence documentation.
post_launch_marketing.professional_partnerships: Build relationships with paranormal investigation training programs and professional associations.

engagement_metrics.feature_adoption: > 60% using advanced analysis features within first week

revenue_metrics.revenue_targets: Month 3: $2,500 MRR, Month 6: $7,500 MRR, Year 1: $25,000 MRR

risk_mitigation.technical_risks: Audio processing performance issues on older devices - mitigation through extensive device testing and configurable quality settings. Subscription integration complexity - mitigation through RevenueCat sandbox testing and gradual rollout.
risk_mitigation.market_risks: Niche market size limitations - mitigation through excellence in target market and gradual expansion to adjacent markets. Seasonal usage patterns - mitigation through feature development supporting year-round usage.
risk_mitigation.competitive_risks: Large company entering market - mitigation through professional community relationships and specialized feature development. Platform policy changes - mitigation through compliance-first development and alternative distribution planning.
risk_mitigation.business_risks: User acquisition cost challenges - mitigation through organic community marketing and professional referral programs. Churn rate higher than projected - mitigation through user feedback integration and professional support excellence.

standards_compliance.subscription_store_compliance: Launch strategy ensures compliance with App Store and Google Play subscription guidelines. ASO package follows platform requirements for subscription apps with clear value proposition and transparent pricing.
standards_compliance.accessibility_design: Launch plan includes accessibility validation and testing with target users including those using assistive technologies. Marketing materials designed with accessibility compliance throughout.
standards_compliance.privacy_analytics: Launch strategy emphasizes privacy-first approach in all marketing materials. Success metrics focus on user value rather than data collection, supporting premium positioning.
standards_compliance.testing_release_readiness: Comprehensive launch strategy with phased rollout allowing validation at each stage. Success metrics and KPIs ensure quality standards maintained throughout growth phases.
